[quote comment="23190"]Will you add support for the avatar system for Openid?
http://www.openvatar.com
[/quote]
You should be able to do this pretty easily already... the get_avatar() function added in 2.5 is pluggable, and wp-openid provides a is_comment_openid() function.  Using those, an openvatar plugin could be done with pretty minimal code.
